org.fcrepo.auth.roles.common

Interface AccessRolesProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RbAclAccessRolesProvider

    public interface AccessRolesProvider
    Provides the effective access roles for authorization.
    Author:
    Gregory Jansen, whikloj

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Map<String,Collection<String>> DEFAULT_ACCESS_ROLES

      Deletes all roles assigned on this node and removes the mixin type.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_ACCESS_ROLES

        static final Map<String,Collection<String>> DEFAULT_ACCESS_ROLES

    • Method Detail

      • getRoles

        Map<String,Collection<String>> getRoles(javax.jcr.Node node,
                                        boolean effective)
        Get the roles assigned to this Node. Optionally search up the tree for the effective roles.
        Parameters:
        node - the subject Node
        effective - if true then search for effective roles
        Returns:
        a set of roles for each principal

      • postRoles

        void postRoles(javax.jcr.Node node,
               Map<String,Set<String>> data)
        throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Assigns the given set of roles to each principal.
        Parameters:
        node - the Node to edit
        data - the roles to assign
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if repository exception occurred

      • deleteRoles

        void deleteRoles(javax.jcr.Node node)
          throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Deletes all roles assigned on this node and removes the mixin type.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to delete
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if delete failed

      • findRolesForPath

        Map<String,Collection<String>> findRolesForPath(org.modeshape.jcr.value.Path absPath,
                                                javax.jcr.Session session)
                                         throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Finds effective roles assigned to a path, using first real ancestor node.
        Parameters:
        absPath - the real or potential node path
        session - session
        Returns:
        the roles assigned to each principal
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if PathNotFoundException can not handle
